creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: assembled and framed triptych: two horse carriage about to cross bridge at C with Western passengers; Japanese men and women walking across bridge overlooking a channel with boats; row of peaked white buildings along channel; high structure at C with inscribed plaques; street scene continues at L with Japanese and foreign people, including a Western military band; shoreline with Japanese style castle peaks and mountain in background
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Tōkyō meisho Nihonbashi
